{{Infobox battle item |name = Never Melt Ice |image = [[File:Never Melt Ice.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Never Melt Ice''. |location =
*[[Never Melt Ice#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Never Melt Ice''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Ice_Type_icon.png|30px]] Ice type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Icefall Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ice Path|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Shoal Cave|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Snowpoint Temple|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Frost Cavern|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Seaward Cave|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
